name: Canada Companies Register
notes:
Notes
Link to all the official business registries in Canada
> Type the name of the company
> You will obtain the registry ID, incorporation date, city and the link to the official local business registry.
Notes
This database does NOT include corporations created under financial legislation (such as financial institutions, insurance companies or loan and trust companies) or those created under provincial/territorial legislation or corporate legislation from another jurisdiction. You can find corporations created under provincial/territorial legislation by consulting Canada’s Business Registries.
>Type company name under the corporate name section and click on search 
>You can find corporate history including director names. 
>Other documents such as annual return and information regarding new changes and amendments can be purchased by clicking on 
>“Buy copies of corporate documents” 
>If the information that you are looking for is not listed in this section or you would like certified copies, you can request them by contacting them through ISED-ISDE@canada.ca.
Notes
Canada Ontario Business Register
> Scroll down and under "Search the registry and order search products" click on the button " Search the OBR"
> You will have to enter numbers to proof you are not a robot
> You may get the following " You are in line to search the Ontario Business Registry. When it is your turn, you have will have 10 minutes to enter the website."
> You will enter the website
> Enter the name of the company in the Search filed
> Click on Request Search Products, and select " Order a search product online from the Ministry"
> Select the product Profile Report ($ 8) 
> Enter your email address
> Pay by credit card or request KCP to make the payment
You will receive an email with a link to the Profile Report. This includes address and directors and the list of documents that can be obtained from the registry. 
In case you need one of the documents listed return to:
> Request Search Products, and select " Order a search product online from the Ministry"
> Select the product : Document copies: There are annual returns listed: Please select each filing that you would like to purchase a copy of the documents or click “Select All Documents” to request a copy all documents.

Username- katrien.siewertsz@kcprof.nl Password- KYC-dashboard1!

Any other information and or documents must be requested from the Company's Registered Office. There is a CI$30 (US$36.59) charge to view search results. Payment can be made by credit or debit card, both of which can be used to top up an online account.

name: Delaware
notes:
Visit the link a 
> Enter company name under "Entity Name"
> Click on the searched company for more information
Information retrieved is:
- name
- file number
- adress (make sure you allow flash)
> To get status , tax and history information , click on the status , tax and history information and enter ‘’submit’’
>There you will be led to the payment page where you can pay and receive the documents.
>The documents which can be obtained include : 
- a page listing the 5 most recent filings 
- franchise tax assessment,
- total authorized shares if applicable 
- tax due of the searched entity
- Officer and Director names and addresses are found in the company annual reports and are not available through this application. If you wish to order a copy of an annual report please call 302-739-3073 for more information.’
The client has to pay the required fees , which is non- refundable

name: Gibraltar Companies House
notes:
>Click the link 
Gibraltar does not publicly provide company documents 
>A person can attend at Companies House and request to search the file of a company
>The file will be made available on the following day for inspection
>If you hold an account with Companies House you will be able to email or fax a list of the Companies you wish to search and these files will be available on the following day for inspection
> In order to obtain a Company Profile:
(1) a member of the public can request one at the Registry on payment of £17.50. The Profile will be
ready for collection after 24 hours or
(2) a user of the Registry who has a deposit account with the Registry will be able to request the
profile by email or fax. The Profile can then be emailed, faxed or collected (whichever is requested
by the user). The total cost to a user in Gibraltar will be £17.50

name: India Companies Register
notes:
> Click link 
>Go to MCA services 
>You can only search for a company using the Company CIN/FCRN/LLPIN/FLLPIN numbers or by company name 
>Enter the number
>The results will show 
>The results shown include :
- Address
- Incorporation date
- Directors names 
All this is available free of charge
Step by step process :
1 To access Master Company/LLP Data click “View Company/LLP Master Data” link; to view Index of Charges, click 'View Index of Charges'; and to access signatory details, click on ‘View Signatory Details’ on the left hand side of this page.
2 Enter the Company/LLP Name or CIN/LLPIN of the Company/LLP.
3 Click the Submit button in case CIN is entered.
4 In case CIN/LLPIN is not available Press the “Search” button after entering the first few characters in Company/LLP Name field.
5 List of companies/LLPs would appear. Select your company/LLP by clicking the ‘Select’ button.
6 CIN/LLPIN of the Company/LLP with Company/LLP Name shall be displayed on the screen.
7 Click the Submit button once CIN/LLPIN is displayed.
8 System shall display the required data.
9 To take printout of the same, click on ‘Print’ button given on the page.
10 On clicking the same, the required data shall be displayed in a tabular form. Take the print out of the same.
Alternatively, go directly to the following link:
Login to obtain documents
Username: KCPlijn299 Password: KCProf299! 
Payments can only be made through local Indian bank accounts.

country: Kiribati Ministry of Commerce, Industry and Cooperatives
name: Kiribati Ministry of Commerce, Industry and Cooperatives
notes:
There is no direct access to the list of companies. Information regarding a company is possible via e-mail correspondence. For More information the Email address is: ttamoa@commerce.gov.ki
 >It is not clear which information is provided
> The steps to see the information available via e-mail are as follows: 
>1. Our Office
2. If you click Business Regulatory Center. You get another page.
3. When you are in the Business Regulatory Center page, on the right side there is a list named BRC Divisions. Choose Business and Companies Regulatory Division. Another page comes
4. Business and Companies Regulatory Division page lists the information that can be provided and the costs. 
5. For example Section 6 of CAP10A lists the fees of the documents that might be useful for us 
> For inspection of any register kept by the Registrar, a fee of 50 cents
 > For a copy supplied by the Registrar of any documents or part of any document, a fee of 50 cents per page.

Shares of persons : there is a section for this but does not give the share amount or percentage
Detailed activities.

name: Romania
notes:
"Ministry of Justice of the Trade Register Office (ONRC)
> Select ""Furnizare Informații RC - InfoCert-Recom"" under Regustrul Comertului Recom Online
> Login with: Username KCP - Password: KCProf123! - email : info@kcprof.nl
> Select: Furnizare Informatii Recom Gratuit
> Enter RC (registration certificate) nr of the Romanian entity (a number in the format LN/NNNN/NNNN) OR the CUI number (Romanian Codul Unic de Inregistrare - 8 digits in the format NNN NNN NN with an optional prefix of RO).
> Search for the RC or CUI number online if you haven't received the number from the client.
> Click on ""Cauta"" (= Search for).
> Information obtained is name and address
> Click on Kanton Acțiuni to obtain names of directors
You can request UBO information from the Registrul Beneficiarilor Reali (CENTRAL REGISTER OF REAL BENEFICIARIES) by selecting ""Furnizare Informații din RBR"" and filling a form. There is a lot of information needed to fill in however to collect this information."

>You will receive results , click on the organization name 
>You will receive the organization information including the address and directors’ names 
>For more information regarding annual reports and other important information , please contact the Secretary of State's Office at 304-558-8000.
